1.name: neoplasms
1.description: Diseases related to abnormal growths such as tumors and cancers, including benign and malignant neoplasms.

2.name: digestive system diseases
2.description: Diseases affecting the digestive system, including the stomach, intestines, liver, pancreas, and associated organs.

3.name: nervous system diseases
3.description: Diseases and disorders of the nervous system, including the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nerves.

4.name: cardiovascular diseases
4.description: Diseases of the heart and blood vessels, including heart disease, hypertension, and circulatory disorders.

5.name: general pathological conditions
5.description: General pathological conditions that affect overall health or multiple body systems, not restricted to a specific organ.
